pr_title: SONARJAVA-3197 Rule S3330 should report on "setHttpOnly" method when set to "false" and not when initialized

timeline.bodyText: By removing this check, we can completely get rid of compliantConstructorInitializations, that was used only here!
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3197 Rule S3330 should report on "setHttpOnly" method when set to "false" and not when initialized
